_sText:
Version 1.2  -  01/03/09
1. Increased to 34 player map.
2. HDR lighting added.  (Note! Screen shots are without HDR)
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Version 1.1  -  28/02/09
1. Increased to 32 player map.
2. 'Clip' added to stop platers getting onto pool room roof.
3. Improvements to Nav file, with very helpful advise from Chizbone.
4. Roof design changed to get rid of 'black texture' (large skylight with steel frame)
5. Added a few more props to long hall & roof terrace.
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

My third and defiantly my best counter strike source map to date.
Loosely based and inspired by a real world location.

De_horseshoe is a medium sized defuse map with 2 bomb sites.

Bomb site A located by the horse statue next to CT spawn.
Bomb site B located by 'headless' statue in the central court yard.

BSP Map file includes:-
Nav file.
Map overview for spectators.
Rader overview for players.
All areas are named and have ambient sound.
Spawns for 17 per side.

Hope you enjoy. Please comment and rate if you download.
Rick_0_Shay
